title: First Marriage and then Love - Novel Updates
genre: Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Adopted Children   Cute Children   Love at First Sight   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Multiple Reincarnated Individuals   Reincarnation   Second Chance   Showbiz   Wealthy Characters
author: 青衣画墨
description:
Long Ke Yi was entangled with Ji Yan Tang for 22 years until he finally died in country H.

After his rebirth, he decided to cherish his life and stay away from Ji Yan Tang.

A mistaken blind date led to a flash marriage to the number one diamond bachelor in city B.

Long Ke Yi, “What do you think of me?”

Lan Mo, “Not bad.”

Long Ke Yi, “Are you satisfied with me?”

Lan Mo, “Yes, satisfied.”

Long Ke Yi, “Then do you dare to get married?”

Lan Mo, “Okay.”

This is the story of a little fox dumping a big bad wolf and then being eaten up by a smiling tiger.>
